trans-unit.source: Enables <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.
trans-unit.target: Permite <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controles ou outros controles de servidor para conter conjuntos de verbos.

trans-unit.source: A verb in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Um verbo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles é uma ação que um usuário pode executar na interface do usuário (IU).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um verbo é representado na interface de usuário por um controle clicável como um botão, um link ou um item de menu.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls when placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controles de Web Parts fornece verbos padrão que estão disponíveis por padrão para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles e outros controles de servidor (como custom, ASP.NET e o usuário controla) que pode agir como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla quando colocada em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zonas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export.
trans-unit.target: Verbos padrão incluem fechar, minimizam, restauram, excluir, editem e exportam.

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom verbs for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode criar verbos personalizados para uso com <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>e controles de servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The IWebActionable interface, with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls.
trans-unit.target: A interface IWebActionable, com seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>propriedade fornece uma maneira para integrar os verbos personalizados em controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements the IWebActionable interface and implements its single property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe implementa a interface IWebActionable e implementa sua única propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, you must override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar verbos personalizados a um controle que herda a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe, você deve substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, adicionar verbos personalizados a uma coleção e retorna a coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: A coleção referenciada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade contém somente os verbos personalizados; verbos padrão não são incluídos nesta coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Padrão retornam o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle é `null`, porque por padrão não sem verbos personalizados na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls requires one extra step.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar verbos personalizados para controles de servidor que não são <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles requer uma etapa extra.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In those cases, the controls must also implement the IWebActionable interface and implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, os controles também devem implementar a interface IWebActionable e implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have added custom verbs to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: Depois de adicionar verbos personalizados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>coleção, o controle de Web Parts definido automaticamente trata as etapas necessárias para criar e processar os verbos personalizados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência a uma coleção de personalizado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade verbos referencia uma coleção de verbos personalizados (se houver) que são adicionados a um menu de verbos no cabeçalho de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outro controle de servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Verbs collection does not contain references to the standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de verbos não contém referências ao padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>definir objetos fornecidos com o controle de Web Parts, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class can simply override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que desejam adicionar verbos personalizados para um personalizado de controle que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe simplesmente pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>propriedade que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe implementa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface by providing an implementation of the Verbs property.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que desejam adicionar verbos personalizados a um controle de usuário ou um controle personalizado que não é um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar, deve implementar a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>interface fornecendo uma implementação da propriedade verbos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"> </xref> que contém a custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> objetos.
